name: Wild Wolf Quest: Survival Simulator
description:
Do you like animal simulators? This ultimate wolf simulator would give you an opportunity to live the whole life of single animal – from the small weak and helpless puppy through mature stallion to the ghost of the old wolf! Meet with other animals – herbivores like deer, goats and rabbits gonna be your food, and carnivores like bears, foxes or pumas are your direct rivals!
Feel like gray wolf – hunt animals, eat, drink, run to find another wolf to make a pack, and to journey together! Raise cubs, meet and mate with other wolves, fight against predators and just have fun! Choose gender, name, and color of fur – customize your wolf as you wish!
Keep in mind your health, energy, water and food indicators - if one of it drops – there is no chance to stay alive! Upgrade your wolf’s skills to protect your pack! It’s your chance to give birth to a little cub and start your own wolf family or pack!
Wild Wolf Quest: Survival Simulator features:
Ultimate wild animal survival simulator
Beautiful and realistic 3D world to explore
Ability to start your own pack and raise up cubs
Different animals inhabiting these lands – predators and prey alike
Various upgrades for your wolf – level up it every time you get points
Play Wild Wolf Quest: Survival Simulator and be an amazing wolf living at wilderness and trying to create its own family! Explore the forest as a wild wolf, meet and mate with other wolves, find food for them and fight against other wild predators walking around!
